content.detailedDescription: it was a clear day, cloudless and windless when i noticed an objet very high in the sky that stayed still. thinking it was a bird perhaps i realized it was too high for a seagull as it appeared white. it then caught the sun and became silver. i thought it could be a metalic plane of some kind but it still remained motionless. when i realized it wasn't a plane, it shot across the blue sky, no vapor trail and no sound, over cayuga lake and dissappeared into the blue. i was walking during this time on our road with no traffic.I always look up to spot any birds i may recognize.I did not have a camera so no pics were taken.
content.summary: Very high, stood still ,turned and caught the sun to look silver colored, then shot north and disappeared. sky was totally blue and clear

content.detailedDescription:
Was standing at deer camp in the dark. looked to northeast & saw bright, bright lights that just appeared from no where at a distance of aproximately 5 miles. became brighter & wider ( would guess total light configuration about 1/2 to 1 mile wide)moving rapidly to the north west.First thought it was 2 bomber aircraft going to dyess af base in abilene. but no blinking lights like a standard aircraft & absolutely no noise at all. also flying way to close for 2 aircraft. suddenly disappeared for about 5 minutes, then reappeared about 10 miles from spot last spotted & back where i originally spotted the lights the first time.  this time moving much slower than any aircraft could without losing altitude & crashing. watched for another 10 minutes than "like turning off a light switch" was gone.
my son & his friend were driving to the deer lease from ft worth at about the same time i spotted the lights. they were between rising star & brownwood when they saw the bright lights . as soon as they got to deer camp they asked if i had seen it & what was it??
i was in the air force for 4 1/2 years & a aircraft maint officer. these bright, bright, lights with absolutely no sound were not aircraft.
have never witnessed anything like this before in my life. closest thing would have to be a meteor shower or falling star.But this was more intense & lasted so much longer.
content.summary: Bright object just dropped out of clouds!

content.detailedDescription: 10/25/07 was looking for holmes. saw am extremely bright star, 3/4 way up from horizon, to the north.(i'm in ne, tenn). it strobed continuosly, white, red, blue. next night, it's out there, same place and appearance. next night, 27th, watching it, it appeared to move in a 90* angle, i sighted a star to confirm this. it went up to the star(a short distance), and i said, that thing moved! it then sailed off to the south east, until it was out of sight. it strobed continuosly, and had a strange smoothness in it's passage. hard to explain. afterwards, i took note of the jets in the sky to ascertain it was not a jet, it was not, jets seem cloddish compared to the "moving star", and also jet lights blink on and off, and the lights are way dimmer. i spotted it the next night, but it was stationed farther away, and to the northwest. it was nothing from this place, this technology. i figured they existed(ufo's) but never expected to see one. i'm convinced now. it is a confirmed reality to me, albeit a strange and wonderful one.
content.summary: Looked like very bright star until i saw it move.

content.detailedDescription: Me and my girlfriend were at the farm, just finished hunting.  we were up by the camper cleaning a pig that we had shot.  a bright flash lit up the sky like lightning, only without the thunder, which got our attention considering clear skies and no bad weather.  we both looked up and saw 2 green objects soaring across the dark sky.  they seemed pretty low and a lot larger in size compared to a shooting star but moving equally as fast.  we only saw the objects for 2 or 3 seconds before they dissapeared in the western sky.  i can't imagine how fast the objects were moving but they semmed to accelerate until they dissapeared.  we looked at each other not really knowing what it was, but went on with what we were doing.  2 to 3 minutes later we heard this "boooommmmm"  sound off in the faint distance.  it sounded like a bomb had gone off, way off in the distance.  it wasn't loud but it seemed so far off that if anyone had been outside within  100 miles that they should have heard it.  i thought that maybe a meteor or something had come into the atmosphere and broken the sound barrier causing the sonic boom or maybe it had hit the earth.  havn't hearing anything on the news until now, from the stephenville sightings, i didn't figure anything hit the earth.  i don't know what it was but that is the best i can explain it.
content.summary: 2 objects in sky followed by loud boom!

content.detailedDescription: I walked outside of my apartment and i looked up to look at the stars. there were some clouds, but i saw the blinking light of an airplane moving regularly up ahead. when i looked west, i saw a light that was significantly larger than the plane, but still flying at a decent altitude. it was moving significantly faster than a plane. it was far too large and not nearly fast enough to be a shooting star. it flew like it was being navigated and was not flying in an orbital path like a satellite. it moved to the clouds, and when it got to them it disappeared. at the time i believed it was just hidden by the clouds, which it may have been, but the more i think about it, the more i think it just disappeared. this had me a little shaken up because of the recent sightings of a ufo in texas that has been on the news. i saw one video that cnn ran of the ufo that was not well shot, but if that was the ufo they were seeing, the ufo i saw was identical to it. i have seen planes, helicopters, shooting stars and satellites, but i have never seen anything like this before.
content.summary: Large light, too low and way too fast to be a plane, not a shooting star or satellite.

content.detailedDescription:
In light of the sightings in stephenville, tx, i wanted to share this with you.

there is a big field and wildlife preserve just down the road from my house that i take my 4x4 truck to play (and relax).  the field also has a good amount of wildlife that i will sometimes just park and watch for.  it is sloped somewhat and the east side has a good view of the field and a pretty wide view of the skyline.

i had played in the field for most of the day-nobody else down there at that time-and decided to park up on the east edge and just watch for the hawks and other wildlife.

as i was looking out across the field, i noticed what i thought was a blimp off to the west(ish).  it had a metallic cast to it, meaning i could see that the surface was reflective.  it had a texture in the reflection which made me feel like there were uneven surfaces reflecting light differently.

i assumed it was a blimp and went back to watching the field.
i glanced back at it several moments later and noticed that it wasn't moving, relative to my position-which i thought was strange.  usually, a blimp is going somewhere.  i figured the blimp to be about 2 or so miles from me, based on the size that i assumed a blimp would be.  it appeared to be about 300 or so feet above the ground, based on its size, its angle to the horizon, and how far away i thought it was.

there were several power lines across the field, a mile or so away, and i moved my position slightly in the front seat of my truck to align the object over one of the poles so i could see if it was moving.  it appeared to be drifting slightly to my right.  it didn't appear to get bigger or smaller so i assumed it was moving left to right very slowly.

i called my wife on my cell phone and said "i'm watching something very interesting in the sky" and went on to tell her what i was seeing.  she made a joke about it being a ufo.  i spoke with her for a moment or so, during which time the object had moved only slightly.

i thought, since it wasn't really moving, i'd drive down to centerville rd. (which is around where i thought it would be) and see what it was doing.  i left my location and lost sight of the object at that point.  when i got to where i thought it would be, it wasn't there.  i did not go back to the field to see if i could still see it because i still believed it was a blimp.

i heard on the news reports the next day about the sightings in stephenville and figured this may be related...Or it may just be a blimp.  one thing i thought of in retrospect (other than kicking myself for not taking a picture of it with my cell phone camera) is the fact that i was able to align it with one of the power pole with only a slight shift of my position in my truck leads me to believe the object was much further away than i originally thought.
content.summary: Metallic object stationary in sky with slight drift to my right.  about 5-10 degrees above the horizon line.

content.detailedDescription: We were comeing from eastland, headed home at lake leon around 10:15 pm...Driving south east.  two large bright lights like stars (daughter thought they were stars) in area of orions belt.  daughter noticed them...And commented they didn't belong.  about 7 minutes or so later (just before we turned on to cr 237...Staff road...These two lights moved towards each other very very fast...Faster than anything i had ever seen.  they looked like they meet and then five or six smaller lights dispersed out in a circular pattern away from them and then everything just was gone.  nothing there.  my daughter and i discussed how weird that was...While my other daughter who was in the back seat and didn't see it laughed at us....Thought we were seeing things.
content.summary: Two lights suspended thought was stars. then they moved very fast

content.detailedDescription: On january 16th, something was hovering above the house of a friend.  his 10 year old son and adult femal neighbor were outside and took a picture with their camera phone.  all other details would have to be gotten by them.  i am a family friend (kyle fernung) who is reporting it for them.  their contact information is listed above.
content.summary: Something hovering above a house in windfall indiana

content.detailedDescription:
i have been observing these larger "bright white starlike objects" for some time now. actually, in late june 2007 just before visiting my sister in new york state, i observed a large brilliant white "star" in the sky, and a "pulsating blue/green smaller "star" about six inches below the large "white star." i remember thinking it was a little strange, but really thought not too much of it. my first real observation was while in new york state visiting my sister in the catskills.(it is in the area of pine bush, new york...Which is know for about 20 years now as "the ufo sighting capital of the us," as i later found out after my own "close encounter" while there.)  not only are there the "bright white starlike objects," but smaller blue and red pulsating "stars" both seen in new york and here. usually there is a larger "bright white starlike object," and then several "pulsating red and blue or green" object around the larger "white star like object."  my sister seemed to be absolutely "terrified" by the low hovering red/blue pulsating "stars" as we passed near a radio tower on her road. she just would stare at them and say...."and they are not stars!!"  well, a few days later we found out for sure "they were not just stars!!"  on july 11, 2007 at around 9:45 pm we had the most terrifying "close encounter" with one of the objects!!! we thought we were really going to die!! but we managed to what we now joking call "two blondes out manouvering a ufo!" but it was not at all funny! it was terrifying!! the craft actually was hovering in the tree tops to the left of the rural road we were traveling on to go to her house. we stopped the car!! it moved into position about 40 feet in front of us, about 40 feet above us, then lowered itself in the center of the road, a craft about 30 feet wide, sauser shaped, blue and red pulsating lights on the perimeter, flashing...And a wide as the road blue/grey beam of light coming below it onto the road in front of us!! she wanted to turn around the car and go back towards town!!! all i knew was "don't get under the blue beam of light!! i told her to go to the right into our upper driveway and get into the house!! we actually were at a "standoff" with this craft...Waiting to see who would make the next move...Then we actually had to go toward the craft to get to the upper driveway!!! oh, my god!! we were terrified!!!! but we did it, and swerved to the right just as the thing was coming toward us, we at it!! we knew the thing was over our heads, my sister got out the driver's side door...Running towards the house. i got out the passenger side, was going around the back of the vehicle, when she says "and it's not a helicopter...It makes no noise!!' with that i lifted my head just level...And there it was hovering about 10 feet off the ground between the garage and our house!!! and it made a little whisper of sort of an "electrical" sound. very, very, very faint for a 30 foot craft. there was just a blue/grey sort of misty light around it at this time. then it hovered, then very, very, very slowly lifted up and hovered over the treetops just about 50 feet from me. then slowly took off toward the road again. we ran into the house terrified!!
we would not go out after dark for the three months i stayed there after that. i came back to missouri the end of september, only to find "they are here also!!" 
            anyway, since coming back to missouri i have been watching these blue/green and red pulsating "stars" constantly "hovering" low in the sky....Almost any given night!!! and the "bright white stars" there also!! i have told others about them, but they don't seem to see them. i see them all the time! well, this morning at about 6:30 am i was getting up for work, and looked outside. there was one "hovering" low in the sky. the only "star" out in the sky this morning!!! nothing else!! i went to get dressed, looked out the window again and said to myself upon seeing the "bright white star" in the sky, just hovering low again...."angel transport." (i told someone about these objects in the sky, and he told me, like he really knew, "they are angel transports.") as soon as i said that....I noticed the object was disappearing from my view....Vertically!!
it was moving out of my sight from the window, slowly, slowly upwards!! i ran outside...And it was moving, silently, slowly, slowly straight up!! and there were no other lights on the object...Only a bright, brilliant white light, slowly to me moving straight up!! then it, without any sort of position change, started moving to the east, until it went over my building and getting very small and out of sight. i came upstairs to the highway level of the building....And there it is!! big and bright and very low, hovering again right close up there in the sky again!! i came in to email a friend about it, excited!! i had never seen one move around like this!!! now it's about 7:15 am and it is just staying there, but then a few minutes later it has moved east far away. and now it is gone!!
that was absolutely amazing!! i don't know what they are, who they are, but this one i waved "goodbye" to this morning! i don't know if these are connected, but they seem to be all over. not just here. and i don't know if other "spiritual" things happening in my life, as well as my sister's life, for the past twelve years are realated, but somehow i believe it may be so also. something is definately happening here. now talking to others here, many people tell me stories of "strange sightings" here too. time will tell. and sharing these experiences and sighting can only help to figure out exactly what is happening, and who and what these things are. i hope you will not only find this information "interesting," but helpful in accomplishing this goal. i will "keep watching!!"
content.summary: Bright white

content.detailedDescription:
I am a school teacher, have been for over eight years. i live in fort worth, but last year i taught in duncanville.
to avoid morning traffic, i leave my house early every morning. on my commute to school is when i witnessed the ufo.
i was heading east, to dallas on i-20 from fort worth. being very dark still on account of the sun not coming up yet, i clearly saw the object.
i was approaching, and going under, some very high overpass bridges, i don't know where those are exactly, but i know it wasn't overhead street lights or me being sleepy that caused any illusions.
the object appeared to my left, drivers side, it was moving very fast, totally silent, low; about thirty feet in the air and displayed an orange-yellowish color on the bottom. the shape was more saucer-oval shape; similar to a disk used to slide on snow for fun. the colors seemed darker on the outer edge and more yellow towards the center. the object was in view for about three seconds, but it was toatlly clear to me. i didn't see any other marking, lights or features, just the bottom view. it never stopped, but just flew on and disappeared from my site. it must have flown under the bridge(s) as it never appeared to change course.
let me state clearly, that in no way was it glare from an over-head street light. no way was i sleepy, groggy or distracted. no way was it reflections from any car's headlights. it was in the air, moving and i had no idea what it was.
content.summary: Ufo in dallas, texas

content.detailedDescription: I had been observing jet trails more closely in this area of puget sound for the past few months while outside working or walking since hearing about "chemtrails" reported by someone i met in port angeles. sometimes the trails disappeared relatively quickly like normal jet contrails but some days there were trails laid down in hooked patterns, crisscross patterns or lines that stayed for hours spreading and changing into cloud formations. i have taken photographs and shared them with others. most days the trails can be seen being laid down west of where we live and then they blew over our area with the normal westerly winds on the strait of juan de fuca. i have seen them laid down during the day and at night with moonlight. i was out walking on a cloudy day when i heard an airplane and looked up to see a circular patch of blue sky with a thick jet trail being laid down behind a plane overhead heading in a northwestly direction towards vancouver island, canada. i then saw a bright sphere east of the trail that was not moving. initially i thought i was viewing a planet or star in broad daylight, but after a while it moved slowly at a perpendicular angle over the top of the chemtrail in a westerly direction until it slowly disappeared behind cloud cover. in reading about chemtrails i had seen other reports of these bright spheres or silver orbs, but they typically moved quickly in the reports. i thought if they were some known type of aircraft or weather balloon maybe they would be identified by now since they have been reported before. the movement suggests this would have been moving against the wind that day if it was a balloon and it would have to be fairly large in proportion to an airplane since it was above the plane's trail. i looked closely for evidence of wings thinking the reflection might be hiding wings, but i only saw a sphere.  i did not have a camera that  day.
content.summary: While observing a jet contrail (chemtrail) i saw a bright stationary sphere that eventually moved slowly

content.detailedDescription: I was leaving my mom and dads house and we were out in the front by my car and these really bright lights happened to be on top of us. we all looked up and watched a very calculated light dance (that's what i call it) and from a triangle the lights met each other in any direction that the others were coming from. they did that for about fifteen to twenty min. and them they all met at the middle and took on another shade of light and stayed there for awhile and then all of a sudden it looked like one light and it disappered and we were all standing there like we were really scared because it felt like if we were there but really not. pretty powerful to explain. i also saw something in the sky when i was moving from gorman to cisco. i saw somthing in the sky that made me pull off the side of the road because there was a very large cigar shaped something in front of me and i really could not move or take a breath so i had to pull over and my mom was behind me and came up to my car to see what was the matter and i told her and she said she say it also. we were driving in the middle of the day and i am still freaked about that one. i will never forget.
content.summary: Lights in a triangle that did patterns and then moved away and disappered

content.detailedDescription: I was in the car with my friend who was driving. we were going to rei and traveling northwest on copley drive in san diego. we were traveling on the road just before the store at the following approximate coordinates: 32���50'19.89"n, 117��� 9'41.68". as we were driving i looked out over the military airport adjacent to us and towards the two mountains in the distance, this was in the northeast direction. in the sky about 200-300 feet off the ground and several miles away  past the airfield was a craft hovering in place with an intensely bright white-blue light that flashed with a period of about one second. the light was unbelievably bright considering there was still daylight and the sun had not completely set. the light flashed bright a dim several times as both i and my friend watched in complete disbelief. we pulled over and watched the flashing until it abruptly stopped all light discharge altogether. as i watched, i noticed a strangely shaped, powder gray structure visible when the light dimmed and did not obscure the craft. it had a flat bottom and three large ridges on the top and was extremely large considering it's distance. i would say it would have to be at least a mile wide. we pulled into the parking lot of the rei store and stood on top of the car in order to see the location better in hopes to re locate the object. just as we exited the car a flight of 3 f-18 hornet fighter jets in a triangular formation flew overhead at a low altitude to the exact point that the light was seen. they created much noise and seemed to come from the coast as if they were deployed from an aircraft carrier. we went into the store for about 20 minutes to complete our business and then we left and upon leaving it was starting to get dark. while in the store we heard the noise of many jets and when we exited and looked into the sky there were over 25 military aircraft of all types in the area. both my friend and i had never seen so many aircraft deployed at such a low altitude in our entire lives, the sound of jet engine was eveywhere, there were aircraft of all types blanketing the area and they were not taking off from the adjacent airbase. as we drove we felt very apprehensive and worried about what we had just saw, we traveled down copley park place headed due east. this road is only a slight distance form the previous coordinates. as we drove, far in the distance we both observed a very sharp point of bluish light traveling at a slight downward angle at an extremely high speed. it was moving faster than the military aircraft that were around it and undoubtedly observing it. the number of aircraft that were in the sky at this point is unfathomable, more than i or my friend had ever seen at one time. as we continued driving, i'm not sure of the exact location we both saw a small, dim, but visible light at a very high altitude. the light was flashing with a period of many one millisecond like a strobe very high in the sky. i know of no aircraft that would bear such a light. by this time many of the people in cars that i saw were perplexed by the many jets in the air and helicopters had at this time also entered the area. i want to stress the sheer number of aircraft that were deployed and the fact that they flew in from multiple locations with bright green underwing lights on, suggesting that they had used the lights to aid in equipping underwing weaponry. it was about an hour before the fighter activity subsided. i would like to be further interviewed and would be happy to send pictures i have drawn
content.summary: I looked across an expanse of desert and i saw a massive bright light hovering in place in the air. the light was flashing and was emanating from a strange craft.

content.detailedDescription: i'm not to good with compass directions or longitude and latitude but i will try my best. my  daughter and i were on our way to pick up my 9 year old son from school. it was approximately 2:05pm we were on the 15fwy headed west from temecula to murrieta and merging right onto the 215fwy to go north, when a bright shiny light in the sky caught my attention. i looked up and saw 4 or 5 bright metallic shiny lights  out in the distance above the hills of what seemed to be the lake elsinore area. i screamed at my daughter, " oh my god, what is that?" she looked up  and as she did the lights seemed to have moved slightly and now looked to be 7 or 8 lights that were in some sort of formation or could possibly be part of a single disc shaped object. within seconds it went behind the hills and disappeared. the sighting lasted about 20 seconds. as i drove i tried to watch for it again but it never reappeared. we spent the rest of the day trying to figure out what it might have been. i've never seen a plane just sit in the sky and not move. nor have i ever seen a plane or anything else for that matter change shapes or formation like that. i was very excited and my heart was racing. it gave us something to ponder for a while.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: 4 or 5 metallic bright shiny ball shaped objects in the sky above the hills that changed positions then appeared to be at least 7 lights in a circular shape.

content.detailedDescription:
My son was coming home from the store around 9pm.  as approaching our house, from the road, he could see an object hovering over our home.  as he was turning into our driveway, he was flashing his car lights at the object and it appeared to turn and acknowledge that it saw him.  it then flew over to the neighbors barn.  my son ran inside to get us and me and my two daughters and daughter in law all went onto the front porch and saw the object.  it hovered and then would fly different places.  we observed other airplanes coming into our area around this time and circling above us as if they were looking for the object.  this went on for like 30 minutes.  most of our neighbors and (as we found out the next day) many people in the county and neighboring towns also observed it.  my home was the home that gene winters lived in and reported a ufo sighting in april of 2004.  needless to say, we are a bit concerned that yet another ufo has come here and our government obviously knows about this.  no one reported this to the newspapers?  there was nothing in today's papers or on the news despite hundreds of witnesses!
melissa bex
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Different colored lights, could change shapes, made no noise, hovered

content.detailedDescription:
we were cruising through the texas desert outside of el paso, visiting family in the area, and through the windshield a movement caught my eye.  it was bearly visible at first because the construction was similar to that of something you would make with an erector set, and you could see right through the metal frame work to the sky behind it.  it's body was rectangular, maybe 2feet tall, and 5 feet long, and on each end it went up about a foot higher, with what i supposed was maybe a propeller on each end potentially, since it had a "huey" helicopter look to it and it looked like it had some little landing legs underneath it.  i know for a fact that we were crossing some military base at the time, but there was not a building or offramp for many miles, and this little thing seemed to be too far in the middle of nowhere to be radio controlled.  it slowly crossed the windshield from far right to left, about 200 ft. up, perpindicular to the freeway.  i remember thinking it was so strange to see this intelligently made small pseudo-helicopter in 120 degree heat, and as i looked out my driver window as we crossed paths, this little machine was moving perfectly on some straight pathway towards the desolate rock landscape.  
    i could only theorize that it was some military secret large radio controlled device, but miles from anything in sight seemed just too hard to believe, but if we did make it, very impressive.
content.summary: Approx. 5 ft. long rectangular object, with each end jetting upwards an addntl foot,

content.detailedDescription:
I have tried to send this message once before and did not get through. i am a professional business person in my mid 50's. i have a picture and information that you will be very interested in at the least. this in fact may be what you have been looking for. i am afraid of the overall situation and where i think it may lead. i have told my wife that i will try to forget about again starting next week. i have met with the grandson of james forrestal recently if that tells you anything. my research has lead me to a very frightening conclusion.

if you want to discuss this before i change my mind please call me right away.   

sincerely,

chris
content.summary: See detailed description

content.detailedDescription: I saw three distinct sets of lights, one small light on top a larger light, two fairly close together, one some distance away. i watched for approx. five minutes, they did not move. it was a cystral clear night, lots of stars and constellations. i looked at lights through 50x bonoculars and they were artificial, and the small light did not look to be connected to the large light.My guess at the time was satelites. it was cold, i got tired of looking, went in the house. end of story.
content.summary: Three sets of lights

content.detailedDescription:
Ufo appeared moving thousands of miles an hour. the ufo slowed and turned and went into the foggy translucent brownish cloud and disappeared as a another craft shot out and shot off in the same direction the 1st craft appeared from the west. i believe my brother and i witnessed a portal, which appeared before the ufo arrieved. it happened so fast the speeds were incredible as the craft looked like a time laped film, where the shutter is opening and closing.
it was silver as was the second craft that appeared when the 1st entered the portal. 
we were sitting in the front yard which we did every morning in good weather, my mother,sister, brother and i. my brother and i were so excited we were asking the others, ``did you see that`` although i knew dave had because he commented at the same as we spotted the ufo,look at that!! i didnt realize til later what we had actually witness, was a portal which the ufo`s entered and left our world. i want emphasize the portal (ive given it the name of portal to refer to a doorway) appeared before the ufo arrived!! it occurred about 200ft up just above the telephone wires and about 300ft from where we were standing. we saw the whole incident clearly. 

i have seem many ufos in my life, their visit to my family  started when i was 3 months old  1948. although i believe for my mother their  visits started in her childhood. i was hypnotized by steve fox in portland in an attempt to retrieve those memories,but we werent able too. 
so we aren`t strangers to the ufo phenomenon and recognize when we see some thing unusual but this time i didnt recognize the significance of what we witnessed until much later. 

linda mccraney
content.summary: As i was gazing out accross the distance a hazy brownish translucent cloud appeared about 200 ft off the ground appeared  in a cloudless clear blue sunny sky. as i was puzzling ouver the strange spot in the sky ,suddenly a movement to my left in the sky a

content.detailedDescription:
At approximately 8pm cst on january 16, 2008 i took my dog out for a walk.  it was a relatively clear night.  we walked to the end of our neighborhood (the landings at far oaks) and stood in an empty lot.  directly across from our neighborhood is a large cornfield.  the cross street is old collinsville road.  my dog likes this empty lot and while she was sniffing around i glanced up and thought i saw an airplane flying low to the ground.  the plane appeared to behave strangely--- suddenly zooming up and then going low.  i kept watching and then it started coming towards me and i could not believe what i saw!  

i am not 100% certain but i think it was gray and had 2 bright white lights in front.  on the side there was a red flashing light.  i think triangle shaped is the best description, but it was dark and i was freaked out and can't be 100% sure.  also, it was silent.  

i panicked and ran home as it appeared to hover behind me.  while i was running i was too afraid to look back.  there were lots of lights on in several homes and one house seemed to be having a party (5-7 cars parked on the street).  however, i don't know these people and was too embarrassed to knock on the door about a ufo.  i also did not know who to call.  maybe i should have called the police. 

i then watched the ufo from my driveway.  it continued to go high and low and i couldn't find binoculars and didn't have a camera.  however, within about 30 minutes there were several airplanes in the sky and a large, very loud craft that i suspect was a military helicopter.  this craft was definetly chasing the ufo and stayed in the area back tracking for at least 40 minutes.  there were 2 small planes from a distance that seemed to be flying too close together, but i'm pretty sure they were small personal aircraft and probably were looking for the ufo.  there seemed to be an unusual number of airplanes in the sky last night.

i lost sight of the object because i was too afraid to get in my car and follow it.  today, i very much regret that i did not do exactly that, but i was alone and don't know my neighbors. 

i wish that my name does not appear on the internet.  however, if you want to ask me any additional questions please feel free to call me on my cell phone listed above.  although i'm not sure if i would be able to provide any more relevant information.  today i am really wondering if anyone else witnessed this event.  

for the record, i have always believed in the existence of ufo's.  however, i never expected to see one up close!!  i don't read about ufos or watch tv specials about them.  however, i did watch a special called ufo in illinois on the travel channel about 6 months - 1 year ago.  i was just flipping the channel and the show caught my attention because i had just moved here; the show was a detailed account over several hours about a flying object that police chased for several hours in the surrounding communities where i live.  i now wonder how many ufo sightings occur in this area (i am a city girl from atlanta, washington d.C., philadelphia and chicago-- this is all quite unbelieveable to me!!!!!)
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Triangle like object with 2 white lights and a flashing red one zoomed high and low in a cornfield off of collinsville road.

content.detailedDescription: As i was travelling west on my road in wimberley texas, i saw something hovering in the sky below 1000 feet or so.  it was a bright sunny day without a cloud in the sky and so i wondered why a solid object was just sitting in the sky.  i also wondered what was keeping it there. it just stayed in one spot for a long time.  when the space shuttle blew up some years back, i had seen it from my car and wondered if that is what i was looking at again. but it was actually much too close to be any kind of space shuttle. i needed to get to an appointment so i didn't stay and look at it for more than 4 minutes.  when i looked in my rear view mirror as i was leaving my road, it was still there and then suddenly gone.
content.summary: Bright object with a red light at one end and a blue at the other.

content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend and i were up late after having some friends over when we decided to have our last smoke for the night.  we went to the laundry room and propped open the door as always.  my g/f was looking at the stars when she smiled and said she saw a shooting star.  i quickly looked as we had seen them together before, and when i did i noticed another "shooting star".  i thought to myself this was impossible, and kept looking.  we both witnessed both "star like" shapes of bright flying lights or orbs moving quickly in quick rapid movements up, down, left, right... diagonal... faster than any plane i've watched, and i'm a big plane watcher! eventually because it was so cold we both decided to go in, then i changed my mind and kept watching alone when both star like flying lights or orbs or whatever disappeared one by one into the same spot in the sky.  it was strange and we are not people that think of ufo's, aliens, or any of that.
content.summary: Bright flying lights or orbs...

content.detailedDescription: I was on the back patio with a friend at 6:00 pm. i was placing steaks on the grill when my friend said look at that. he immediately said what is that? i looked up and spotted a small bullet shaped object traveling quite fast in a straight line to the west, northwest. it was comletely quiet and traveling at about 1500 ft. elevation. it appeared to be moving in a level straight line. it was difficult to judge the speed but, it was moving under power and was out of sight in about six seconds max. it was not dark yet and the sky was overcast. the object was dark in color and did not have any lights on it. it was not raining but, there were some wind gusts so, i know the onject was not a balloon because the wind did not have any affect on it. it was definately moving under some kind of power. the object was not a small airplane because, it did not have any wings. there was no visable signs of propulsion. the object did not have any wings, propellers, engine flame, or smoke trail. i would estimate the object to be approximately 15-20 foot long and 6 to 8 foot wide.
content.summary: I witnessed a bullet shape object

content.detailedDescription:
While sitting on the couch one evening, my roomate and i saw something through the window and ran outside to look and we saw a big, circle, looking ufo that had red and white lights. it was also pretty loud. 

we were amazed and curious at this object. we then got on the computer and researched ufo's.

I was sitting in a local park parking lot just relaxing when i noticed a oval shaped metallic object fly in from the western sky it was flying pretty low and flying at a medium speed i could tell it was metallic because the sun shine reflected off of it i've been seeing quite a few ufos lately i have never seen too many here in iowa but they are appearing more frequently
content.summary: Oval metallic ufo appears after winterstorm

content.detailedDescription:
I went out on my front porch to look outside.  it was very dark, and i just happen to look up in the east sky and i saw a very bright light.  at first, i thought it was just a star,but then it moved very slowly forward and from side to side, but not far in distance.  i called my wife out to see what she thought and she could see what i was seeing.  i went back in and got my bicolucors and look at the object.  it was still moving very slowily in a small area and i could not see any shape to it.  it had a very bright light with very small lights around it.  i came to the conclusion, that it was just a hot air baloon.  it was not an airplane, as i know about the blinking safety lights on an airplane.  i started to call the police station to she if anyone ele was watching, but, thought better of it, as that would just say some crazy old man is seeing things.
my daughter came out on the porch and could see what we were seeing.  
so. we just forgot about it, untill alot of people in our area saw something also.  i have a very goog camera, but took no thought to trying to take a photo of what we were seeing, because we thought it was just an hot air baloon.  thanks bill hensley
content.summary: Big light moving very slow in east sky

content.detailedDescription:
"family witnesses mysterious lights over carolina coast"

i didn't see it but i saw the report on our local fox8 tv news in sept along with other reports of sightings over nj coast around the same time

here's the link to the local tv report

http://www.Myfoxwghp.Com/myfox/pages/home/detail;jsessionid=8e609166e1ca71ee5d721ded16e76e36?Contentid=4326401&version=4&locale=en-us&layoutcode=tsty&pageid=1.1.1&sflg=1
content.summary: Family witnesses mysterious lights over carolina coast

content.detailedDescription: I was in my car to take back some dvd rentals, around 0900 pm on jan 8 2008. heading southeast to acton tx. the blimp size craft fist came from over my left shoulder.I was at a the stop sign on hideaway bay and meander. i watched it and thought that it was too low for a commercial airline. so i thought it was military and it was going to land in fort worth. the large craft was not to loud maybe a hum like a generator. it looked like there was to jets following it on both sides at the rear.I can not recall how may lights, but i belive there were a red lights rear and front. not too bright but blinking. then when i was on fm hwy 4 it was in front of me. now the the jets that look like it was following the large plane (about the size of a military bommer,i think from pictures i have seen ),look more like big turbines(jet engines) you see on planes. only one on each side but large. it moved slow,low and steady , heading southeast from granbury, tx. i just lost interest. did not think anything about it. till i heard there were other sightings. and the military denies any activity that night. please let me know if there is an explaination to this.
content.summary: Large, low flying, two blinking red lights, quiet, slow, two jet at the rear or turbinds,

content.detailedDescription:
It was just about to be 8:00(7:58) pm, and i was driving south on texas 377 just south of keller. i was stopped at a stop light, when i had a clear view up the western sky. the sun had long gone down by now and the stars were visable. as i sat at a stop light, i viewed west and saw what appeared to be a "shooting star", but there was something odd about this. it did remain in sight about as long as a shooting star, about 1 second, but it was really bright; a distinct white streak, as long as it remained in sight. the tracjectory was in a 90 degree angle going from top down. and also, it was unusually close to the ground. which lead me to speculate what it was. if it was a shooting star that was visable, it would have been overhead and fade in color. this was about 2-3 inches from the crest of the earth. if a shooting star was that far away to be that close to the horizon, it would be too far away to actually see. and especially too far away to be that bright and defined.  

i shrugged this off as a non-event, until the next day when im on the way to work and the radio is talking about a major sighting in stevenville, texas which is 1 1/2 west of keller, and about the same time i saw the "star".
content.summary: "shooting star" near time of sighting
